    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenFontSizeSpan

        public SpenFontSizeSpan()
        Creates an SpenFontSizeSpan instance.
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • SpenFontSizeSpan

        public SpenFontSizeSpan(int startPosition,
                        int endPosition,
                        int expansionType,
                        float size)
        Creates an SpenFontSizeSpan instance with the span properties.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - The start position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        endPosition - The end position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        expansionType - The expansion type of span.
        size - The font size.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the endPosition is smaller than the startPosition. If the expansionType is negative or lager than the SpenTextSpanBase.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE. If the size is negative.
        Since:
        4.0.0
